main_headings: IND vs ENG Live Score, 3rd Test Match Day 5: Jadeja slams fifty; India 163/9 at tea, need 30 more to win at Lord's
prominent_paragraphs: What a session! India added 51 runs for the loss of one wicket in the extended 2 and half hours of play in the second session.Ravindra Jadeja (56*) keeps India in the hunt, with Mohammed Siraj (2*) for company on the crease.India 163/9, need 30 more to win
IND vs ENG Live Score, 3rd Test Match Day 5: Two runs!

Valuable runs! Mohammed Siraj drives it and runs two off Brydon CarseCarse goes full and Siraj responds with a sweetly timed off-drive, threading it through the gap wide of mid-off. Woakes gives chase, but the batters are back comfortably for a couple.Welcome runs for India as the crowd stays firmly engaged.India 162/9, need 31 more to win
